content: These suggestions are really helpful! I think I'll try to focus on creating a clear and concise storyline with my visualizations, and use a combination of bar charts, scatter plots, and heatmaps to show the patterns and trends in my customer purchase data. I also like the idea of using interactive visualizations to make it easier for my audience to explore the data. Do you have any tips on how to effectively present my findings to my professor and classmates? Should I create a formal presentation or a written report?
